channel.title: CVE Feed for ShinHer Information Co., LTD. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ShinHer Information Co., LTD. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-42332|2024-08-04T03:30:38.262Z -- shinher%20information%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- shinher%20studyonline%20system
item.description: The “List View” function of ShinHer StudyOnline System is not under authority control. After logging in with user’s privilege, remote attackers can access the content of other users’ message boards by crafting URL parameters.

item.title: CVE-2021-42330|2024-08-04T03:30:38.279Z -- shinher%20information%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- shinher%20studyonline%20system
item.description: The “Teacher Edit” function of ShinHer StudyOnline System does not perform authority control. After logging in with user’s privilege, remote attackers can access and edit other users’ credential and personal information by crafting URL parameters.

item.title: CVE-2021-42331|2024-08-04T03:30:38.271Z -- shinher%20information%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- shinher%20studyonline%20system
item.description: The “Study Edit” function of ShinHer StudyOnline System does not perform permission control. After logging in with user’s privilege, remote attackers can access and edit other users’ tutorial schedule by crafting URL parameters.

item.title: CVE-2021-42329|2024-08-04T03:30:38.352Z -- shinher%20information%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- shinher%20studyonline%20system
item.description: The “List_Add” function of message board of ShinHer StudyOnline System does not filter special characters in the title parameter. After logging in with user’s privilege, remote attackers can inject JavaScript and execute stored XSS attacks.
